articles.title: Mergers: Commission clears acquisition of Activision Blizzard by Microsoft, subject to conditions - European Commission

articles.author: Jill Lawless
articles.title: UK promises more missiles, attack drones for Ukraine as Zelenskyy meets Sunak on European tour - The Associated Press
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was in Britain Monday on his whirlwind European tour, as the staunch ally of Kyiv promised to give Ukraine hundreds more missiles and attack drones in an effort to change the course of the war.
articles.content: LONDON (AP) Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was in Britain Monday on his whirlwind European tour, as the staunch ally of Kyiv promised to give Ukraine hundreds more missiles and attack drones… [+6204 chars]

articles.author: Morgan Meaker
articles.title: More Penguins Than Europeans Can Use Google Bard - WIRED
articles.description: Nobody in the EU can access Google’s Bard chatbot. But the 50,000 penguins who live on a dormant volcano in the South Atlantic can sign up right now.
articles.content: The blocs omission hints at the larger power struggle between regulators and Big Tech in Europe. At a minimum, the search giant needs more time to compare Bard with the EUs draft AI Act, says Henk va… [+3714 chars]
